item.title: Commercial support for Amanda
item.description: Commercial support for Amanda We have assembled a list of companies and people who are available to provide some sort of commercial support for amanda. Although Amanda is provided as-is, some consultants and companies have made their services available to provide more support beyond what’s available on the mailing lists. If you want to be on this list, please Contact us. PLEASE NOTE: Companies and Consultants listed on their page are listed solely at their request.
